seg.source: 神秘鱼惊现 Banff 一花园
seg.translation: Mysterious fish spotted in Banff garden
Mysterious fish discovered Banff a garden

seg.source: Banff 的一位居民发现有鱼惊现自家花园，随后发出了求助。
seg.translation: A resident in Banff suddenly found a fish in the garden, and called for help.
A resident of Banff discovered that fish had found its own garden and had subsequently sent for help.
A Banff resident called for help after spotting fish in his garden.

seg.source: Kevin Bain 认为这75条鱼可能是被海上龙卷风刮来的沙鳗。
seg.translation: Kevin Bain thought the 75 fish might be the sand eel brought by the waterspout.
Kevin Bain thinks the 75 fish may be the sand eel that was blown by a tornado in the sea.
Kevin Bain believes the 75 fish were probably sand eels blown by tornadoes in the sea.

seg.source: Bain 先生居住在距离大海约500米的地方，他在 Periscope 上发布了这一奇怪场景的视频，希望有人能为他解释为何会出现这些两英寸长的鱼。
seg.translation: Mr. Bain lives in a place about 500 meters away from the ocean. He published the video with the strange phenomenon on Periscope and hopes that someone is able to explain how these 2-inch long fishes appeared.
Mr. Bain, who lives about 500 metres from the Sea, released a video of the bizarre scene on Periscope, hoping someone could explain to him why these two-inch fish were present.
Mr Bain, who lives about 500 metres from the sea, posted a video of the bizarre scene on Periscope in the hope that someone would explain to him why the two-inch-long fish appeared.
